Oct. 9, 1954 D North Wales Brass Band Association Selection Contest (Class D)
North Wales Brass Band Association Selection Contest (Class D) 0 Other North Wales Brass Band Association Selection Contest north-wales-bba-selection-contest-class-d
Beautiful Britain
Pavilion Theatre, Rhyl March contest(The North Star) 1st Nantlle, 2nd Beaumaris, 3rd Ruthin. 4 bands competed. 6th annual contest.
